title: HoP 212 - Like Father, Like Son - Debating the Trinity
itunes:title: HoP 212 - Like Father, Like Son - Debating the Trinity
description: Discussion, debate and denunciation of philosophical attempts to explain the Trinity in Abelard, Richard of St Victor and Bernard of Clairvaux.
content:encoded: Discussion, debate and denunciation of philosophical attempts to explain the Trinity in Abelard, Richard of St Victor and Bernard of Clairvaux.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson
